steps: Roll the pastry out into a very thin rectangle and dust with the cocoa and icing sugar.

Roll up the pastry from both ends until they meet in the centre. Slice into 1cm/½in slices and place onto a baking sheet. Place into the oven and bake for 5-6 minutes, or until risen and cooked through.
To serve, place onto a plate, dust with cocoa and drizzle with honey.
title: Chocolate palmiers
